# The Magic Wardrobe

The Magic Wardrobe () is a 2011 Icelandic family film directed by Bragi Hinriksson.
Cast
* Sverrir Þór Sverrisson as Sveppi
* Vilhelm Anton Jónsson as Villi
* Guðjón Davíð Karlsson as Gói
